Articles.Content: While i was making a starliner recreation i tested the abort system and when i deployed the chutes it didnt slow down at all any one got a fix
A lot of things could be wrong. Could you post a pic of your ship after deploying the chutes and before it crashes?

This question about how to play the game has been moved from General Discussion to Gameplay Questions.

KSP Forum Moderation Team

13 hours ago, Deimosksp said:

While i was making a starliner recreation i tested the abort system and when i deployed the chutes it didnt slow down at all any one got a fix

Without much (or any) data I can only guess that the module you wanted to protect didn't get high enough for the chutes to have a chance of slowing it down.
Don't make the abort button deploy the parachutes, deploy them from the staging like you normally would. That might help.
